page.title: 16Christies nurseries
page.content: Founded in 1820 this family business has become established as one of the major producers of trees in Scotland. In 1984 over 14 million trees, mainly Sitka spruce,Scots pine and Larch were sold. The acreage needed for this size of harvest has meant expansion outside the original site to land at Ordiquish and Tulloch,a few miles out of Fochabers. The original nursery specialises as a garden centre providing a supply of plants,trees and shrubs for the many gardeners in the surrounding area. The present firm is run by Mr George Christie and his family, employing about 50 people most of who reside in the village.
